text: Javier Alberto Barreda Jara (13 December 1966 â€“ 3 June 2019) was a Peruvian politician. He was a member of the Aprista Party. He served as the Minister of Labor and Promotion of Employment for four months, from January to April 2018. He was born in Lima. He was educated at Cayetano Heredia University and Pontifical Catholic University of Peru. Barreda Jara died of a heart attack on 3 June 2019 in Lima. He was 52. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Politicians from Lima
title: Javier Barreda Jara
